projects.title: MizuSkin – AI-Powered Social Skincare App
projects.description: Developed an iOS skincare app using SwiftUI, Azure Functions, and OpenAI API to provide AI-powered skincare recommendations, personalized routines, and social sharing features that boosted user engagement and retention.
highlights: Designed a cloud-integrated architecture with a TypeScript (Node.js) backend, Azure Table Storage, and Azure Blob Storage, achieving scalable data handling and secure authentication.
Set up CI/CD pipelines so new features could be shipped quickly with automated builds, tests, and deployments.

projects.title: PhreekyNoises – Social Music Tracking App
projects.description: Implemented a full-stack web application using React, Node.js, HTML, CSS, and MySQL enabling users to track their music habits and connecting Spotify API, managing authentication, music history, and friend connections.
highlights: Integrated the Spotify API to pull user listening history and profile data, persisting it in MySQL for charts and long-term insights.
Managed development tasks and feature implementations using an Agile Scrum board, coordinating sprints and iterative improvements across the project.

projects.title: ASL AI System
projects.description: Developed an ASL recognition system using PyTorch and TensorFlow/Keras with a layered CNN-LSTM model trained on augmented and processed data from the Microsoft ASL dataset, leveraging OpenCV for real-time video processing.
highlights: Designed a responsive and accessible React.js frontend for real-time ASL interpretation.
Integrated Google's Text-to-Speech API to convert recognized gestures into spoken output.

projects.title: Airplane Crash Exploratory Data Analysis
projects.description: Performed large-scale analysis of airplane crash data using Python (Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn) with Apache Spark for data transformations and Hadoop for storage/retrieval, building Random Forest models to assess crash severity.
highlights: Used k-NN, K-Means clustering, and Naive Bayes for classification and clustering to explore crash patterns.
Leveraged Spark for parallel computation to speed model training and designed Tableau dashboards to show crash trends, severity distributions, and potential safety improvements.

projects.title: THETA TAU MU GAMMA: Automated Greenhouse
projects.description: Developed object-oriented embedded C++ firmware on an Arduino Mega to manage sensor data acquisition, relay-controlled motors, and system state across digital and analog I/O interfaces.
highlights: Designed and implemented integrated digital and analog circuits connecting moisture and light sensors, DC water pumps, relays, LED lighting, and a touchscreen display to enable autonomous environmental monitoring and control.
